overview:
Christophe Raynaud is the general Manager of ISAI, the french internet founder’s fund (72 entrepreneurs, 35Mâ‚¬ undermanagement).

Previously, Christophe managed Paris Business Angels (the leading angel network in France).

He gained great exposure to startups and venture through an executive education at HBS and a work experience with Saeed Amidi and his team (AMIDI group and also Amidzad partners/PlugandPlayTechCenter).

Before funding and backing early stage startups, christophe has been a web entrepreneur from 1999 until 2005 (chateauonline, netboussole, samaris). He graduated from HEC school of management in 1998
